name: 30 Days Challenge Tracker | Notion Template
description: Track your 30 Days Challenges with one click of a button. Easy 1 minute setup for a new challenge.WHAT IS NOTION?Notion is a free software that will help you to build a system to organize everything - finance, content, clients, personal life, movies & books - you name it. It provides you with versatile blocks that you can use to create your own dashboards, databases, task lists, etc. WHAT IS INSIDE?Challenges Dashboard (See all the info about your challenges, challenge entries, buttons, etc
features: Challenges Dashboard(See all the info about your challenges, challenge entries, buttons, etc on the main page); Summary(Quick overview of your active challenges progress); Completed Challenges(See all the completed challenges in this section with the minimal summary); Unfinished Challenges(See all the unfinished challenges in this section with the minimal summary); Quick Buttons(Complete the day or finish the challenge with a click of one button)
